[requires]
cpython/3.8.16@karabo/py38
cmake/3.27.1

[generators]
deploy

[options]
# statically-link libraries for
# python deps and python loadable modules
*:shared=False
# shared libpython3.so
cpython:shared=True
cpython:with_tkinter=False
cpython:optimizations=True

[imports]
lib, * -> lib
lib64, * -> lib64
bin, * -> bin
include, * -> include
res, * -> res
share, * -> share
local, * -> local
